[customizations]

  [[customizations.user]]
    name = "user"
  [customizations.disk]
    type = "gpt"

  [[customizations.repositories]]
    id = "one"
    enabled = true
    gpgcheck = true
    repo_gpgcheck = true
    sslverify = true
    install_from = true

  [[customizations.repositories]]
    id = "two"
    enabled = true
    gpgcheck = true
    repo_gpgcheck = true
    sslverify = true
    install_from = true
